title: The FedPreneur Show
desc: As part of Omega 4.0, we are hosting a talk show featuring influencers and industry leaders, including potential speakers. This event offers a platform for these thought leaders to share their insights and experiences, inspiring attendees and fostering a culture of learning and motivation. Participants will gain valuable knowledge and inspiration.

title: FPL 2.0
desc: Join us for the FED Premier League (FPL) 2.0, an IPL-inspired auction event where teams of 8-10 members bid on players within a virtual budget of 75 crores. Participants will draft squads from categorized players, fostering teamwork and competition. The top three teams will win prizes, and all participants will receive certificates. Refreshments will be served.

title: 405 Found Hackathon
desc: The hackathon, 405 Found, is an intensive, collaborative event designed to foster innovation and problem-solving. Participants will develop solutions based on various themes and tech stacks within a fixed timeframe. Key activities include initial, second, and final code pushes, ensuring progress and integrity.

title: Investors Adda
desc: Investors Adda is a startup pitch event for student teams to solve industry-specific problems and present their ideas in 3-5 minutes, followed by a 5-minute Q&A session. Winners are determined by the highest investments and strategic decisions, with titles like "Star-Pitcher" and "Smart-Investor" awarded. This event fosters a marketplace of ideas and encourages interaction and analysis.
